title: Prime Package
description: Overnight delivery will never be the same....Disillusioned with her boring routine and nonexistent love life, math teacher Mischa Bennett decides to do something about it. On a whim, she orders The Velveteen, one of the most raved-about sex toys on the market. What she doesn’t expect is for the sexy toy company to fail to use discreet packaging, creating the perfect opportunity for a smoldering man in his prime to discover exactly what’s inside…. When park ranger Keith Summers takes a side gig as a delivery man to pay the bills, the last thing he expects is for super fast romance to happen when his dream woman opens the door to sign for her perfect package. Finding himself intrigued and unable to let it go, he is determined to show her that he has a prime package of his own, and he will do whatever it takes to make her hottest dreams come true. Will their racy romance begin and end at the doorstep, or will she open the door to a love that lasts forever?
author: Blaire Cox
